languages.text: "Знаю я это место. Калькасар призвал обе наших стаи, чтобы закрыть этот портал в Семь Преисподних. Мы пролили немало крови... Жаль, не ксеносов и отродий варпа, а железных жрецов самого Калькасара. Пока они трудились над богомерзкими машинами, дуновение зла из врат обращало их в бесноватых монстров".

"I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."
languages.original_text: "Знаю я это место. Калькасар призвал обе наших стаи, чтобы закрыть этот портал в Семь Преисподних. Мы пролили немало крови... Жаль, не ксеносов и отродий варпа, а железных жрецов самого Калькасара. Пока они трудились над богомерзкими машинами, дуновение зла из врат обращало их в бесноватых монстров".

traits.locale_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both of our packs to seal this portal to Seven Hells. Lots of blood did we spill... Unfortunately, not the one of xenos and abominations of the warp, but of the Iron Priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on heretical machines, the evil blowing from the gates was turning them into wicked monsters."

"I know this place. Calcazar summoned both of our packs to seal this portal to Seven Hells. Lots of blood did we spill... Unfortunately, not the one of xenos and abominations of the warp, but of the Iron Priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on heretical machines, the evil blowing from the gates was turning them into wicked monsters."

"I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs to seal this portal to Seven Hells. Lots of blood was spilt... Bitterly, not the blood of the xenos or the abominations of the warp, but of the Iron Priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on those heretical machines, the evil gales from the gate were turning them into wicked monsters."

"I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs to seal this portal to Seven Hells. Lots of blood was spilt... Bitterly, not the blood of the xenos or the abominations of the warp, but of the Iron Priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on those heretical machines, the evil gales from the gate were turning them into wicked monsters."

"I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."

languages.text: “我知道这个地方。卡尔卡扎把两支狼群召集到了这里，封锁了这个通往恐怖与灾祸的入口。当时，这个地方血流成河……但遗憾的是，那些血既不属于异形，也不属于亚空间的怪物，而是属于卡尔卡扎的齿轮祭司。当时那些人在调查那扇遭到诅咒的大门，门里忽然吹来了邪恶的气息，把他们变成了发狂的怪物。”
languages.original_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."

traits.locale_text: “我知道这个地方。卡尔卡扎把两支狼群召集到了这里，封锁了这个通往恐怖与灾祸的入口。当时，这个地方血流成河……但遗憾的是，那些血既不属于异形，也不属于亚空间的怪物，而是属于卡尔卡扎的齿轮祭司。当时那些人在调查那扇遭到诅咒的大门，门里忽然吹来了邪恶的气息，把他们变成了发狂的怪物。”

languages.text: « Je connais cet endroit. Calcazar a fait appel à nos deux meutes pour sceller ce portail de malheur. Le sang a coulé à flots, ce jour-là... Malheureusement, ce n'était pas celui des xénos ou des abominations du Warp, mais des technoprêtres de Calcazar lui-même. Tandis qu'ils s'affairaient sur les machines impies du portail, le souffle malveillant venu de l'autre côté les a transformés en monstres enragés. »
languages.original_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."

traits.locale_text: « Je connais cet endroit. Calcazar a fait appel à nos deux meutes pour sceller ce portail de malheur. Le sang a coulé à flots, ce jour-là... Malheureusement, ce n'était pas celui des xénos ou des abominations du Warp, mais des technoprêtres de Calcazar lui-même. Tandis qu'ils s'affairaient sur les machines impies du portail, le souffle malveillant venu de l'autre côté les a transformés en monstres enragés. »

languages.text: "Ich kenne den Ort. Calcazar beorderte unsere beiden Rudel dorthin, um dieses Portal zu den Sieben Höllen zu schließen. Dabei wurde viel Blut vergossen ... Allerdings schmerzlicherweise nicht das Blut der Xenos oder der Abscheulichkeiten des Warp, sondern das der Eisenpriester von Calcazar. Als die Eisenpriester an diesen ketzerischen Maschinen arbeiteten, wurden sie von den üblen Stürmen des Tors in teuflische Monster verwandelt."
languages.original_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs to seal this portal to Seven Hells. Lots of blood was spilt... Bitterly, not the blood of the xenos or the abominations of the warp, but of the Iron Priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on those heretical machines, the evil gales from the gate were turning them into wicked monsters."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kenne den Ort. Calcazar beorderte unsere beiden Rudel dorthin, um dieses Portal zu den Sieben Höllen zu schließen. Dabei wurde viel Blut vergossen ... Allerdings schmerzlicherweise nicht das Blut der Xenos oder der Abscheulichkeiten des Warp, sondern das der Eisenpriester von Calcazar. Als die Eisenpriester an diesen ketzerischen Maschinen arbeiteten, wurden sie von den üblen Stürmen des Tors in teuflische Monster verwandelt."

languages.text: «Conozco este lugar. Calcazar convocó a nuestras dos jaurías para sellar este portal al terror y el pesar. Aquel día derramamos mucha sangre... pero no fue la de los xenos ni la de los engendros de la disformidad, sino la de los engranasacerdotes del propio Calcazar. Mientras trabajaban con las inmundas máquinas del portal, el malvado hálito que soplaba del otro lado los convirtió en monstruos descontrolados».
languages.original_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."

traits.locale_text: «Conozco este lugar. Calcazar convocó a nuestras dos jaurías para sellar este portal al terror y el pesar. Aquel día derramamos mucha sangre... pero no fue la de los xenos ni la de los engendros de la disformidad, sino la de los engranasacerdotes del propio Calcazar. Mientras trabajaban con las inmundas máquinas del portal, el malvado hálito que soplaba del otro lado los convirtió en monstruos descontrolados».

languages.text: 「私はこの場所を知っています。カルカサルは、この恐怖と災いへの入り口を封印するために、私たち一群の両方をここに召喚しました。その日、我々は沢山の血を流すことになりました…。残念ながら、それは異種族やワープスポーンの血ではなく、カルカサル自身の血です。彼らがゲートの汚らわしい機械に取り組んでいる間、向こう側からやってくる邪悪な息吹が彼らを狂乱の怪物へと変えてしまったのです」
languages.original_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの場所を知っています。カルカサルは、この恐怖と災いへの入り口を封印するために、私たち一群の両方をここに召喚しました。その日、我々は沢山の血を流すことになりました…。残念ながら、それは異種族やワープスポーンの血ではなく、カルカサル自身の血です。彼らがゲートの汚らわしい機械に取り組んでいる間、向こう側からやってくる邪悪な息吹が彼らを狂乱の怪物へと変えてしまったのです」

languages.text: "Bu mekânı biliyorum. Calcazar, dehşete ve teessüre açılan bu geçidin mühürlenmesi için sürülerimizin ikisini de çağırtmıştı. O gün çok kan döktük... Ne var ki bu kan; zenoların yahut öte yaratıklarının değil, Calcazar'a hizmet eden dişli rahiplerindi. Geçidin meşum makineleriyle uğraşırlarken şerrin öte taraftan gelen soluğu, onları gözü dönmüş canavarlara çeviriyordu."
languages.original_text: "I know this place. Calcazar summoned both our packs here to seal this portal to terror and woe. Much blood we did spill that day... Alas, it was not the blood of xenos or warp spawn, but that of the cog-priests of Calcazar himself. While they were working on the gate's foul machines, the breath of evil coming from the other side was turning them into frenzied monsters."
